'Robins Air Force Base' is a major United States Air Force installation located
in Houston County, Georgia, United States. The base is located just east of and
adjacent to the city of Warner Robins, Georgia, SSE of Macon, Georgia, and about
SSE of Atlanta, Georgia. The base is named in honor of Brig Gen Augustine Warner
Robins, the Air Force's "father of logistics".
